author: schor
msg: [UIMA-3437] set the recovery interval to 0 for the message Listener, before stopping the channel, to avoid a 30 second timeout in edge case where no message was ever received on the channel which is the case for the AS extended test testGenerateAndDeployPrimitiveDD.
